changelog.title: Yi's Solutions - Change log
changelog.log:
- Added Windows 11 26H1 rules, packaging tutorials, and video tutorials. *New
  - Allows automatic background update checks, new feature. *New
  - Mounting of Install.esd is now supported; DISM version must be greater than 26100.2454; *New
  - Allows adding 'search sources, directories, and RAMDISK' to Windows Defender exclusions; *New
  - Added Windows 11 25H2 video tutorials, autonomous driving solutions, and packaging scripts. * New
  - Deleted the outdated 23H2 packaging tutorials. * Del
  - Routing function: self-healing sequence after adding * New
  - API: Application Programming Interface, Shortcut: (API *) * New
  - New shortcut commands and dynamic UI * New
